name: The Grand Garden
description:
Grow all the plants that the manager needs before the end of the day  or you will be fired.

Controls:
WASD to move
M to select tool
N to use tool

This game was made for the GBJAM10

Credits:
Towel Defence Comic by sawquarenoise https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/Towel_Defence_OST
Towel Defence Jingle Loose by sawquarenoise https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/Towel_Defence_OST
Strike Witches get B*tches by Azureflux https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Azureflux/Pocket_Boy
